New Records: James Rodriguez has now scored or assisted 10 times in his past eight international appearances
Key Match Events: Colombia overcame reigning World Cup and Copa America champions Argentina 2-1
Yerson Mosquera scored the opening goal for Colombia
Rodriguez converted from the penalty spot after Daniel Munoz was brought down by Nicolas Otamendi
Diego Gomez gave Paraguay a 1-0 home victory over Brazil with a stunning first-half strike
Post-Match Reflections: Rodriguez said after the match that 'It was a great win against a team that has won everything.'

Bolivia manager Oscar Villegas said that 'We're very happy with the outcome of the match but at the same time we're sad for Carlos (Lampe). He will need surgery and will likely need a long recovery period.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Colombia's victory lifted them to second in the 10-team South American zone standings with 16 points from eight qualifiers, two points behind leaders Argentina
Bolivia secured a 2-1 away victory over Chile
Chile's third consecutive qualifying defeat slumped them to ninth in the group with just five points so far
Others: Brazil's faltering campaign hit another hurdle in South America's World Cup qualifiers
